definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: The Euphrates, the colors of the waters.
sentences.chinese: 我還記得幼發拉底河的河水，顏色漂亮極了。

sentences.english: The Parthian Empire shared a border with Rome along the upper Euphrates River.
sentences.chinese: 帕提亞帝國與羅馬共享沿着幼發拉底河上游的邊界。

sentences.english: He proposes that Rome should allow the Parthians to hold sway over the territory east of the Euphrates.
sentences.chinese: 他提議羅馬允許帕提亞人統治幼發拉底河東部的領土。
